layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x126
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x126
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x102
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 463x19
          text run at (0,0) width 463: "The three boxes below should have progressively thinner bottom borders."
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,36) size 66x66 [color=#000080]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 66x66
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 66x62
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 20x62 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (1,17) size 18x28 [border: (3px solid #000080) (5px solid #000080) (3px solid #000080)]
                LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 12x19
                  text run at (3,3) width 12: "A"
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (24,2) size 19x60 [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (1,17) size 17x26 [border: (3px solid #000080)]
                LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 11x19
                  text run at (3,3) width 11: "B"
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (45,2) size 19x58 [r=0 c=2 rs=1 cs=1]
